statements: UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 120 WHERE call_id = 1;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_type = 'Outgoing' WHERE call_id = 2;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_timestamp = '2022-01-20 14:30:00' WHERE call_id = 3;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 300 WHERE caller_number = '1234567890'
UPDATE call_logs SET call_type = 'missed' WHERE receiver_number = '9876543210'
UPDATE call_logs SET call_timestamp = '2021-12-31 12:30:00' WHERE call_id = 101
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 120 WHERE caller_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE caller_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET call_frequency = 5 WHERE customer_id = 10;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = call_duration + 10 WHERE caller_id = 123 AND receiver_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET call_frequency = call_frequency + 1, last_call_timestamp = now() WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = call_duration - 5, call_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE caller_id = 123 OR receiver_id = 456;
UPDATE CallLogs SET call_duration = 120 WHERE call_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE CallPatterns SET call_frequency = 10 WHERE pattern_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
UPDATE CallLogs SET call_duration = call_duration + 10 WHERE call_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE Customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_phone_number = '+1234567890'
UPDATE CallPatterns SET call_frequency = 3 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 30 WHERE call_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE call_patterns SET average_duration = 40 WHERE pattern_id = 1;
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 30 WHERE call_duration < 30 AND call_id IN (SELECT call_id FROM call_patterns WHERE call_type = 'missed');
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET behavior_description = 'New behavior' WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND behavior_date > '2021-01-01';
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 120 WHERE call_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE customer SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE call_ratings SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Excellent service!' WHERE rating_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = call_duration + 10 WHERE call_duration > 20;
UPDATE customer SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE call_ratings SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Excellent service!' WHERE call_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
